headline: REYNOLDSTECH 16 'X 16', HOT PLATE 200° C,
description: 200° C 16 " x 16" Hot Plate with Vacuum Hold Down
categories.lvl1: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment > Wafer Fabrication Equipment
categories.lvl2: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment  >  Wafer Fabrication Equipment > Other Wafer Fabrication Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Reynoldstech
Model Custom
Description Hot Plate, 200° C, 16" x 16", Vacuum Hold Down
Other Information Max Temp with hot plate covered -- 200°C, cover not included
Max Temp with hot plate not covered -- 160°C
Digital set point controller
Overtemp controller
Vacuum hold down -- vacuum pump not included
(4) substrate lift pins, with 1/4-20 female threads to accept custom tips.

Lift Pin Layout:

Top and Bottom: 4.5" from edge of hot plate to pins
Left and Right: 2.875" from edge of hot plate to pins

Vacuum hold down area: 11" Wide x 12" Deep

N2 Input for lift pin cyclinders.
Vacuum imput for hold down.
Condition Very Good
Power Requirements 120 V 15.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Depth 26.000 in (66.0 cm)
Height 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
